name: soil_history_data
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ambee_soil_data.
Tool description: Global real-time soil API. Integrate soil API for global real-time soil information. Test an API call. Get accurate & actionable data insights. 
API description: Fetches historical soil data for a given location and date range using the Ambee API.

startdate.description: The start date for the soil data in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

enddate.description: The end date for the soil data in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.
